headline: Ask HN: Why did a bunch of people from Rails core team resign today?
description:
Today three people resigned from Rails core: https://github.com/rails/website/commits/main

From what I’ve pieced together is for on Twitter, https://world.hey.com/dhh/no-railsconf-faa7935e kicked off a wave of resignations, but I’m not sure why they all hit today v on March 3.

Does anybody know what’s going on with Rails core team?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么今天Rails核心团队的一群人辞职了？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼今天Rails核心團隊的一群人辭職了？
description_zh-Hans:
今天有三个人从Rails核心团队辞职：https://github.com/rails/website/commits/main

从我拼凑出来的信息是为在Twitter上，https://world.hey.com/dhh/no-railsconf-faa7935e 掀起了一波辞职潮，但我不确定为什么他们都在今天V在3月3日。

有人知道Rails核心团队发生了什么吗？
description_zh-Hant:
今天有三個人從Rails核心團隊辭職：https://github.com/rails/website/commits/main

從我拼湊出來的信息是為在Twitter上，https://world.hey.com/dhh/no-railsconf-faa7935e 掀起了一波辭職潮，但我不確定為什麼他們都在今天V在3月3日。

有人知道Rails核心團隊發生了什麼嗎？
